0: They gave us another renovated room on the 3rd floor
Entrance light was broken and was never repaired after being reported
Clearly the hotel has been renovated updated recently
Maintenance came and promised to clean up the mold while we were gone to a conference the next day but when we came in late that afternoon it was still there
Took 3 tries for maintenance to get the stopper in lavatory to work
The facility seems to have recently undergone renovations Which seemed to be very nice still some dated features about
Besides the AC the lobby has not been renovated for decades
there is no reason why I should have to call maintenance 3 times for a clogged toilet
The management said they were remodeling not evident and when we told them about the mold it was cleaned only by the air conditioner when we returned that night
The hotel is average at best they said I had one of the renovated rooms but there were hole patches in the walls shower was terrible and room was not great by any means
1: This hotel appears to be newly remodeled
the rooms are decent design wise but the hotel seems to be old and it looks like they may have updated the bathrooms etc
We spent two nights at the newly remodeled Doubletree Dunwody
The room appeared to be updated and mostly clean
They obviously remodeled the inside and did a wonderful job
2: The room is remodeled and comfortable
It looked like the rooms were renovated which was nice
Great customer service from room attendance and excellent food from there newly updated menu
This Doubletree has been recently renovated and is nice
Renovations super nice but air conditioner needs updating too
The check in was about 30 seconds and the lobby decor was very chic and updated
Great hotel newly renovated room and excellent bed terrific service shout out to Mariane and Charmaine and good breakfast granola
It was safe newly renovated and comfortable
This Double Tree Hotel was remodeled to impress deliver a great stay
